sentence.Network_en: A good sharp dressing counterpointed the sweetness of the dried fruit.

lj.lj_ly: Khrushchev's next visit to the West was one of sweetness and light.
lj.lj_ls: 赫鲁晓夫接下来对西方的那一次访问是政治上和谐的访问。

entry.tran: (关系)友好;(情况)令人愉快，顺利
entry.def: If you say that a relationship or situation is not all sweetness and light, you mean that it is not as pleasant as it appears to be.

example.ex: It has not all been sweetness and light between him and the Prime Minister.
example.tran: 他和首相的关系并不总是那么愉快融洽。

means.word_mean: 1. the taste experience when sugar dissolves in the mouth

sentences.sentence: "he was charmed by the sweetness of her manner"
"the pleasantness of a cool breeze on a hot summer day"

auth_sentence.content: 'T come here if you want sweetness and light.

sentences.cn: 她的笑里只有虚情假意的甜蜜。

sentences.en: What he said dripped with false sweetness.
sentences.cn: 他的话中充满了虚情假意。

sentences.en: This is a full-bodied wine with just a hint of sweetness.
sentences.cn: 这是一种味道醇厚的葡萄酒，只有一丝甜味。

sentences.en: The sunburnt grass breathed a harvest breath of dry sweetness and content.
sentences.cn: 草给阳光晒枯了,发出一阵叫人意满心欢的收获期的芳香气息。

sentences.en: If you have tasted the bitterness of gall,you know better the sweetness of honey.
sentences.cn: 吃过黄连苦,更知蜜糖甜。

sentences.en: She’s all sweetness and light as long as you’re doing what she wants.
sentences.cn: 只要你顺着她的意愿，她又亲切又和善。

sentences.en: Their quarrel seems to be over. Everything’s all sweetness and light at the moment.
sentences.cn: 他们的争吵似乎结束了，眼下一切都风平浪靜了。
